name: Among Us Bot
description: A Discord bot for organizing Among US custom games.

ROLE.description: Create role in your server > right click role for Copy ID > paste it here

QUEUE.description: Create queue channel in your server > right click queue channel for Copy ID > paste it here

PREFIX.description: Enter symbol you want to use before a command name to call that command

OWNER.description: right click on your name on left member pane and press Copy ID > paste it here
